title: Devilish Bodoni
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161020im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1764b97e5f5a34ba852d674b894bd58926e08e7d_m_5385.png)

I've seen this around a bit, and thought it was from [BP](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015161020/http:/www.bpfoundry.com/) but it's not, any ideas?

Thanks!
author: loki

comments.content: aw yeah, that was it! Thanks Florian!
now does anyone have 645 euro to lend me? :P
The price is quoted in Swiss Francs, so you only need €425.
Are you calling me a Didot?
